name: Switch Off
description:
Switch Off is a small experimental game/interactive 'thing' about our ability to process information. Once you know the trick, the whole thing can be done in less than a minute.

The game requires a webcam and is designed to played in a room with artificial lighting. It won't work properly in a naturally lit room! The webcam is used for gameplay purposes only - nothing is recorded, and the game has no ability to save any data, including images.

When playing in a desktop browser, using Chrome is recommended to ensure access to the webcam. The game currently doesn't work in any tested mobile browser.

Switch Off features some vulgar imagery including brief examples of cartoon nudity. Nothing worse than you might expect to see on an unattended whiteboard in a high school classroom - much of the information we absorb on a daily basis is vulgar in one way or another in any case.
